name: Rock 'N' Roll (itch)
description:
Play this remake of the Amiga classic game from 1989, The original game was written by Rainbow Arts.

Guide your ball through the maze looking for the exit. On your way you'll be met by various obstacles and temptations.

Collect money to buy items to either help or hinder your progress.

Try to find the quickest route or the highest score, each level designed for a challenge either way.
